name: Short acting beta agonist inhalers
title: short acting beta agonist (SABA) inhalers
compared with prescribing of inhaled corticosteroid inhalers and SABA inhalers
description: Prescribing of short acting beta agonist (SABA) inhalers - salbutamol and terbutaline
compared with prescribing of inhaled corticosteroid inhalers and SABA inhalers
why_it_matters: reports that high use of short acting beta agonists (salbutamol and terbutaline) and poor adherence in the use of
inhaled corticosteroids in asthma suggests poor control, and these patients should be reviewed regularly to ensure good control.
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AA' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AC' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (80 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AD' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AE' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) + V/Spac (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AF' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 95mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AG' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AH' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AI' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg Disk + Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AJ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 400mcg Disk + Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AK' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg Disk Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AL' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 400mcg Disk Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AM' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AN' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AP' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) CFF (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AQ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg (60 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AR' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AV' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh Cap 200mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BH' OR --Salbutamol_Cyclocap Cap 400mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BU' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) CFF (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BW' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh Cap 200mcg    @gn (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BX' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 200mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BZ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CA' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CB' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200D)+Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CC' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200D) Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AA' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AC' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AF' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) + Spac (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AJ' OR --Terbut Sulf_Pdr Inh 500mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AL' OR --Terbut Sulf_B/A Inha 500mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AM' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AZ' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400D) Ref  @gn (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%BB'    --Terbut Sulf_B/A Inha 500mcg (120 D) (brands and generic)
denominator_where:
(bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AA' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AC' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (80 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AD' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AE' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) + V/Spac (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AF' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 95mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AG' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AH' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AI' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg Disk + Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AJ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 400mcg Disk + Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AK' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg Disk Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AL' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 400mcg Disk Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AM' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AN' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AP' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 100mcg (200 D) CFF (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AQ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg (60 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AR' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%AV' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh Cap 200mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BH' OR --Salbutamol_Cyclocap Cap 400mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BU' OR --Salbutamol_Inha B/A 100mcg (200 D) CFF (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BW' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh Cap 200mcg    @gn (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BX' OR --Salbutamol_Inha 200mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%BZ' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CA' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 200mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CB' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200D)+Dev (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011R0%CC' OR --Salbutamol_Pdr For Inh 100mcg (200D) Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AA' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AC' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) Ref (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AF' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400 D) + Spac (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AJ' OR --Terbut Sulf_Pdr Inh 500mcg (200 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AL' OR --Terbut Sulf_B/A Inha 500mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AM' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (100 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%AZ' OR --Terbut Sulf_Inha 250mcg (400D) Ref  @gn (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0301011V0%BB' OR --Terbut Sulf_B/A Inha 500mcg (120 D) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0302%')           --Corticosteroids (Respiratory) 
AND 
(bnf_code NOT LIKE '0302000K0%AI' AND --Budesonide_Inh Soln 1mg/2ml Ud Vl (brands and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0302000K0%AJ' AND  --Budesonide_Inh Soln 500mcg/2ml Ud Vl (brands and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0302000N0%AV' AND  --Fluticasone Prop_Inh Soln 500mcg/2ml Ud (brands and generic) 
bnf_code NOT LIKE '0302000N0%AW') --Fluticasone Prop_Inh Soln 2mg/2ml Ud (brands and generic)
